mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks him for the book and poetical epistle; narrative of expedition and loss of the "Philadelphia," and exploits of brave tars at Tripoli must be read with interest; would have been more pleased had he found author's position in it more equal to his talents.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 December 14, Washington [D.C.] to William Ray, n.p.
